description: Documentation management configuration - defines which docs are living (kept) vs stale (purged)

livingDocs.description: Essential documentation that gets updated with protocol changes

staleDocs.description: Documentation patterns that indicate temporary/debug files (auto-purged)

exceptions.description: Files matching stale patterns but should be kept

autoClean.comment: Set maxAgeInDays to auto-delete stale docs older than X days (null = delete all matching patterns)
